front.title: Vocabulary For Expressing AI Substitutive Usage

abstract.t: This Internet Draft proposes a category entitled "AI Substitutive Use" which would enable parties to express a preference regarding how digital assets are used by automated processing systems, with a focus on post-training (inference-time) uses that are likely to result in the creation of AI-generated outputs that substitute for the original asset. The proposal is for this category to nest within the larger category of Automated Processing, currently envisaged in the working group draft [AIPREF-VOCAB] (21 July 2025).
